channel.title: Want to help you go from idea to product-market fit as fast as possible
channel.description:
Hey bootstrappers!
My goal is to help you go from idea to product-market fit so you can raise funding if you want or keep on bootstrapping. I feel like my goal is to help you reduce risk of working on the wrong thing.
Currently I work at a tech startup as a conversion rate optimization but the machines are coming for my job :slight_smile:
I'm look forward to seeing what this is all about.
